DataElement.preferredName: Medication Used Duration in Years Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of years a participant has used this type of medication.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the use of medication.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A drug or substance that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Value expressed as a number with 4 total digits with 2 digits after the decimal.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/13/2015 removed upside down question mark from change note. jk 2/10/12 FBPP content retired per Jenny Larkin (NHLBI); VD reused by other context and kept released.  12/14/06-to support the NHLBI-FBPP specific data element size.
